channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Quasi-Boolean groups
item.description: arXiv:2502.07681v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We give several equivalent characterisations of the maximal pro-2 quotients of real projective groups. In particular, for pro-2 real projective groups we provide a presentation in terms of generators and relations, and a purely cohomological characterisation. As a consequence we explicitly reconstruct such groups from their mod 2 cohomology rings.
item.dc:creator: Ambrus P\'al, Gereon Quick

item.title: Combinatorial model categories are equivalent to presentable quasicategories
item.description: arXiv:2110.04679v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We establish a Dwyer-Kan equivalence of relative categories of combinatorial model categories, presentable quasicategories, and other models for locally presentable (infinity,1)-categories. This implies that the underlying quasicategories of these relative categories are also equivalent.
item.arxiv:journal_reference: Journal of Pure and Applied Algebra 229:2 (2025), 107860, 1-39
item.dc:creator: Dmitri Pavlov

item.title: $K_2$-regularity and normality
item.description: arXiv:2501.01567v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We take a fresh look at the relationship between $K$-regularity and regularity of schemes, proving two results in this direction. First, we show that $K_2$-regular affine algebras over fields of characteristic zero are normal. Second, we improve on Vorst's $K$-regularity bound in the case of local complete intersections; this is related to recent work on higher du Bois singularities.
item.dc:creator: Christian Haesemeyer, Charles A. Weibel
